text: Aur hum ney musa (alh-e-salam) say tees raaton kay wada kiya aur dus raat mazeed say inn tees raaton ko poora kiya. So inn kay perwerdigar ka waqt pooray chalees raat ka hogaya. Aur musa (alh-e-salam) ney apney bhai haroon (alh-e-salam) say kaha kay meray baad inn kay intizam rakhna aur islah kertay rehna aur bad nazam logon ki raaye per amal mat kerna
